spiritsExplanation:
This workout is classified as "High-Energy & Intense" due to several key indicators. The description mentions "high intensity intervals" and "raising your heart rate," which are strong signals of a vigorous and demanding session. The intensity level is indicated as 3 out of 3, reinforcing this classification. Additionally, the HIIT format and upbeat, energetic playlist further support this categorization, resulting in a high score of 0.9.

The workout is also categorized as "Outdoor & Adventure" because it takes place on the Hillsborough River, clearly an outdoor and nature-based setting. This environment is integral to the experience, and the rowing aspect reinforces the adventure element. The combination of outdoor rowing on natural water and the riverine context underscores this spirit, with a score of 0.8.

Other potential spirits like "Flow & Rhythm" or "Structured & Disciplined" were considered but excluded because the focus on intensity and environment was more prominent.
